text: Oscarino Costa Silva, best known as Oscarino (January 17, 1907 - September 16, 1990) is a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Fluminense (4): :Ypiranga: 1928, 1929, 1930, 1931 * Campeonato Carioca (2): :América: 1935 :Vasco da Gama: 1936 Category:1907 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Footballers from Niterói Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Oscarino
